allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update Banko Arts portfolio with improved UI and features

- Enhanced Services & Expertise section layout
- Added new filter categories for Recent Works section
- Improved hero section text readability with shadows
- Enlarged Recent Works image cards (grid-cols-3)
- Removed Interior filter and unnecessary tools (Revit, Lumion, Blender, Twinmotion)
- Fixed image repetition issue in Recent Works
- Aligned all service boxes to same height
- Updated architecture projects with detailed categories
- Added EmailJS contact form integration
- Implemented responsive design improvements

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(npx wrangler pages project create bankoarts --production-branch=main)
Bash(npx wrangler pages domains add bankoarts.com --project-name=bankoarts)
